data.title: Philippine Railways Institute
data.meta_description:
Philippine Railways Institute | 1,007 (na) tagasubaybay sa LinkedIn. The Research and Training Center for the railway sector, under the Department of Transportation. | The PRI is a research and training center for the railway sector under the Department of Transportation (DOTr).

It serves as the planning, implementing, regulating, and administrative entity for the development of human resources in the railway sector to ensure the delivery of efficient, reliable, and safe railway transportation services. 

The PRI also ensures that personnel working in each railway line have the right knowledge, skills, and attitude for operations and maintenance through the issuance of certificates of competencies.
data.text: ğŸŒŸ Exciting Announcement: Engr. Kimjay Lamar to Speak at PhilRailway Tech Conference 2024! ğŸŒŸ We are thrilled to introduce Engr. Kimjay Lamar, Chief Transportation Development Officer of the Philippine Railways Institute (PRI) under Department of Transportation - Philippines (DOTr), as one of the esteemed speakers at #PhilRailwayConferenceTech2024! ğŸ—“ï¸ Event Details: ğŸ“… Date: June 26, 2024 ğŸ•– Time: 8:00 AM to 6:00 PM ğŸ“ Venue: Manila Marriott Hotel About the Esteemed Speaker: Engr. Kimjay Lamar is the chief of Research and Development for the Philippine Railways Institute (PRI), a research and training center under the Department of Transportation (DOTr) in charge of developing and enhancing the competency of railway workers. After he earned his master's degree in transportation science, he joined the Philippine Railways Institute (PRI) during the early stage of development of the young organization. He leads the research and development efforts of the PRI through collaboration with different stakeholders, development of policy research, creation and steering of research agenda, and promotion of railways to the public. Keynote Presentation Topic: Railway Workforce Development: Ensuring Sustainable Railway Operation and Maintenance Join us to gain insights from Engr. Lamar on developing a sustainable and skilled railway workforce crucial for the future of transportation in the Philippines. ğŸ‘‰ To know more about the Department of Transportation: https://lnkd.in/gWuzkRx6 ğŸ‘‰ To know more about the Philippine Railways Institute: https://lnkd.in/gKBtj-ng ğŸ‘‰ For more details about the event, please visit our official website: https://lnkd.in/gs_ACeX8 ğŸ‘‰ To register for the event: https://lnkd.in/gMHhU966 For speaking opportunities, partnerships, and inquiries, please contact Eloisa Marfa, Senior Event Producer: ğŸ“ +63 955 483 7959 ğŸ“§ eloi.marfa@escom-events.com Don't miss this chance to learn from one of the leading minds in transportation!
